name: kaspailer
description: Transforms angular.js code written in java script to ecma script 6 angular code

scripts.test:cov: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --compilers js:babel-core/register --colors --reporter dot test/
scripts.test:travis: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --compilers js:babel-core/register --colors --reporter spec test/
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run clean && npm run build

author: Hristijan Dimitrieski
